attributes.action: abandon any proposal to increase taxes on 4x4 vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Transmissions don't cause CO2

In any case, the amount of CO2 emitted by ALL forms of transport is less than 15% of all manmade CO2.

In turn all manmade CO2 (transport (15%), industry (85%)) is not even one percent of all the CO2 in the world

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
